effect.scarlet-violet: For five turns (including this one), passive effects of held items are ignored, and Pokémon will not use their held items.
effect.the-teal-mask: For five turns (including this one), passive effects of held items are ignored, and Pokémon will not use their held items.
effect.the-indigo-disk: For five turns (including this one), passive effects of held items are ignored, and Pokémon will not use their held items.

short_effect.scarlet-violet: Negates held items for five turns.
short_effect.the-teal-mask: Negates held items for five turns.
short_effect.the-indigo-disk: Negates held items for five turns.

flavor_text.scarlet-violet: The user creates a bizarre area in which Pokémon's held items lose their effects for five turns.
